campaign_context: Benefits Made Simple - Mojo Solo Video Campaign

recommendations.title: Optimize Pricing Calculator Conversion
recommendations.description: Current calculator likely has drop-off points. Add progress indicators and value reinforcement.
actions: Add progress bar to pricing calculator
Include value propositions at each step
Simplify form fields and reduce friction
Add social proof elements (testimonials)

recommendations.title: Enhance Automated Proposal Generation
recommendations.description: Current proposal system can be optimized for faster delivery and better personalization.
actions: Add client-specific ROI calculations to proposals
Include industry-specific case studies
Implement instant proposal delivery (< 1 minute)
Add video walkthrough of proposal contents

recommendations.title: Landing Page Conversion Optimization
recommendations.description: Optimize landing page based on benefits communication best practices.
actions: A/B test headline variations
Add benefit-focused hero video
Optimize mobile experience
Add trust indicators and security badges

recommendations.title: Personalized Email Sequence Optimization
recommendations.description: Enhance email sequences with dynamic content based on package selection and company size.
actions: Segment email lists by company size and package interest
Create dynamic content blocks for different personas
Implement behavioral triggers based on calculator usage
Add video testimonials from similar companies

recommendations.title: Advanced Funnel Analytics Implementation
recommendations.description: Implement detailed tracking to identify exact conversion bottlenecks.
actions: Set up detailed event tracking in GA4
Implement heatmap analysis on calculator
Add conversion pixel tracking for retargeting
Create custom dashboard for real-time monitoring
